title: Dysney mulan
response: Disney's Mulan is an empowering film that celebrates Chinese culture. It celebrates tradition and honors family, while also conveying modern values and progressive ideals. Mulan is an inspiring figure for all, showing the power of courage and determination.

title: Kung fu panda
response: Kung Fu Panda provides valuable lessons about self-confidence, determination and perseverance. It shows us how even a seemingly weak creature, with consistency and self-belief, can achieve amazing results.
